layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 784x158 [border: (3px solid #008000)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 784x26 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (355,3) size 74x19
            text run at (355,3) width 74: "caption text"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (3,29) size 778x126
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 778x122
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 774x122 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 740x119
                text run at (1,1) width 740: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"
                text run at (1,21) width 740: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"
                text run at (1,41) width 740: "table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap table text which should wrap"
